title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Education) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department education) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Diane O’Gorman, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Diane O’Gorman, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Education, is appointed as Special Adviser to 
Josepha Madigan, Minister of State at the Department of Education, with effect 
from 22 May 2023 to 22 March 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

9 July, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [402] 3
